build.pre-install: bash -lc 'pod repo remove trunk || true; pod repo add trunk https://cdn.cocoapods.org/ || true; pod repo add master https://github.com/CocoaPods/Specs.git || true; pod repo update'
build.post-install: bash -lc 'if [ -d ios ]; then cd ios; if [ -f Podfile ]; then (grep -q "https://cdn.cocoapods.org" Podfile || sed -i.bak "1isource \'https://cdn.cocoapods.org/\'" Podfile); (grep -q "https://github.com/CocoaPods/Specs.git" Podfile || sed -i.bak "1isource \'https://github.com/CocoaPods/Specs.git\'" Podfile); fi; pod install --repo-update --verbose; fi'
